code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{createUserWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import{doc,setDoc}from"firebase/firestore";import{auth,db}from"../firebase";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Cadastro(){const[nome,setNome]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[senha,setSenha]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleCadastro=async()=>{try{const userCredential=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,senha);await setDoc(doc(db,"clientes",userCredential.user.uid),{nome,email});navigate("/reserva");}catch(error){alert("Erro ao cadastrar: "+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Cadastro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nome",value:nome,onChange:e=>setNome(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Senha",value:senha,onChange:e=>setSenha(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCadastro,children:"Cadastrar"})]});}
